post: ## Amsterdam Today was my last day in Amsterdam (for now at least). It was the first time since arriving in The Netherlands that I've behaved, quite unabashedly, like a tourist. My day included exploring the botanical gardens, buying a watch at a street market, making friends with some strangers at a cafe, taking photos of canals, watching a soccer match played by *real people*, and getting a haircut and a cup of coffee...*at the same time*.
